Articles.Content: I think it would be really cool for contracts to give you a sattelite to launch to orbit, instead of specifications.  Like a company wants a sattelite in keo-syncronous orbit, and your craft files has a new folder called contracts. In that folder would be all the predesigned sattelites you need to launch.

Might be good to be able to say certify a launch platform after doing a few of these contracts. So instead of excepting contracts offered you would say we have Platform X which will put n Kg to orbit and the milk run automation system will just deliver a recurring steam of revenue.

On 10/1/2022 at 5:41 PM, RilonMusk said:
